thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Jan Sim
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Jan Sim

author: Jan Sim
title: Jan Sim
text: We packed the item we were sending ourselves, Pack & Send has packaging guidelines on their website which was very helpful. It was a Friday that we arranged everything on the Pack & Send website, on the Monday the parcel was collected by a very friendly driver in Brisbane and then our parcel arrived at it's destination, in perfect order, in rural southern NSW by that Thursday. We were really impressed with how quick the service was! Add to this how easy it was to arrange everything online, also how cheap Pack & Send where compared to other services - great value for money and we will definitely be using Pack & Send again and have already recommended them to friends and family. Very happy customer!
